summary: STEERING WHEEL STICKS, MOSTLY WHEN MAKING LEFT TURNS.  BMW IS AWARE OF THE ISSUE WITH THESE VEHICLES BUT STATES "NOT A SAFETY ISSUE, SIMPLY A NUISANCE"  THIS IS NOT TRUE. THIS IS A SIGNIFICANT SAFETY ISSUE AND ONGOING!!  *TR
